DOC.brief_summary: This study design demonstrate result read clarity VS-SENSE substantially equivalent result read clarity Nitrazine pH Paper test vaginal secretion .
DOC.detailed_description: Once inform consent sign , clinician perform following : Record baseline variable CRF . The 1st clinician obtain vaginal secretion sample use VS-SENSE swab . The 1st clinician obtain specimen separate labium expose vagina . The yellow tip VS-SENSE swab insert vagina approximately 5 cm/ 2 '' . The 1st clinician use VS-SENSE accord instruction use - attachment 1 protocol . The 1st clinician read VS-SENSE result record designate form ( Clinician Report - VS-SENSE Result form ) , fill table regard VS-SENSE reading clarity form.Vaginal examination ( include speculum examination ) - perform 2nd clinician , mask result 1st clinician test . The 2nd clinician use vaginal swab pH measurement Nitrazine pH Paper test . The Nitrazine pH Paper test perform accord strict manufacturer 's instruction . The 2nd clinician read result Nitrazine pH Paper test result , document Clinician Report - pH Test Result form , fill table regard pH test reading clarity form .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Symptomatic woman , age 18 . 2 . Subjects willing able sign inform consent form . 1 . Subjects unable unwilling cooperate study procedure . 2 . Subjects currently participate clinical study may directly indirectly affect result study . 3 . Women blood present vaginal secretion . 4 . Subjects sexual relation apply vaginal douched within previous 12 hour . 5 . Subjects apply vaginal medication within last 3 day . 6 . Subjects symptoms sign pelvic inflammatory disease .
